page.title: 06FASHIONS IN THE EIGHTIES
page.content: MANY ASPECTS OF LIFE TODAY ARE VERY SOPHISTICATED.THERE ARE MANY ELECTRICAL DEVICES SUCH AS COMPUTERS, TELEVISIONS, VIDEO RECORDERS AND MICROWAVE OVENS WHICH ARE RELATIVELY INEXPENSIVE AND VERY POPULAR IN MODERN HOMES. HIGH FASHION CLOTHES ARE IMPORTANT ESPECIALLY FOR THE YOUNGER PEOPLE. THEY ARE OFTEN OF VERY BRIGHT COLOURS AND DESIGNS. 'BAT-WING'JUMPERS. JEANS AND 'MINI-SKIRTS' ARE POPULAR FOR THE GIRLS. BOYS, GIRLS AND ADULTS ALL ENJOY WEARING INFORMAL LEISURE WEAR SUCH AS JOGGING SUITS, TEE-SHIRTS, AND JOGGING SHOES. MANY PEOPLE ENJOY EATING OUT AT RESTURANTS AND BURGER BARS SUCH AS MacDONALD'S. LOUD POP MUSIC OF ALL TYPES IS VERY POPULAR WITH SUCH GROUPS AS 'WHAM','SISTER SLEDGE', 'DURAN DURAN' AND MANY OTHERS.
